articles.description: In the Secret Fountain levels, I fell in love with the water. I didn't notice it at first. I was just digging downwards, flattening baddies with my shovel, enjoying the regular knockabout fun of a 2D platformer. But then I started getting hit by fish. Quite a…
articles.content:
Compact and terrifying, this score-attack shooter feels like it's come from the future.
